recordCreates.description: Note that Service Partner field is not currently being populated as the account able to be referenced. Default account should be "Spark N4L Servicedesk" Acc ID: 0019000000ojq5hAAA
recordCreates.name: SP_Request_Log
recordCreates.label: SP_Request_Log

fields.name: Case_Closed_MSG
fields.fieldText:
Note: This case is CLOSED , new requests cannot be submitted using a closed case. You need to open a new case.
.
{!Footnote_ExitWindow}

fields.name: Contact_Info_MSG
fields.fieldText:
Note: The Contact Details are INCOMPLETE and are required for any request
.
Please amend before attempting to submit request.
.
{!Footnote_ExitWindow}

fields.name: Default_Info_Err_MSG
fields.fieldText:
Note: The Contact Details are INCOMPLETE, required Spark Service Request Type and Request Note fields are BLANK
.
Please amend before attempting to submit request.
.
{!Footnote_ExitWindow}

fields.name: No_SR_Type_MSG_0
fields.fieldText:
Note: This incident case has no Spark Request Note SPECIFIED. Please return to the case, amend and then re-attempt.
.
{!Footnote_ExitWindow}

fields.name: No_SR_Type_MSG
fields.fieldText:
Note: This case has no Spark Service Request Type SPECIFIED. Please return to the case, amend and then re-attempt.
.
{!Footnote_ExitWindow}

fields.name: Number_of_Incident_Requests_MSG
fields.fieldText:
Note: A request is already been reported as being submitted using this Incident case. Only ONE request may be submitted on an Incident Case.
.
{!Footnote_ExitWindow}

fields.name: Number_of_Upgrade_Requests_MSG
fields.fieldText:
Note: A request is already been reported as being submitted using this Upgrade case. Only ONE request may be submitted on an Upgrade Case.
.
{!Footnote_ExitWindow}

fields.name: Req_Ref_MSG
fields.fieldText:
Note: The current submitted request Does Not have a reference associated. Additional requests can ONLY be submitted once a reference is associated.
.
{!Footnote_ExitWindow}

fields.name: Request_Note_Blank_MSG
fields.fieldText:
Note: The Spark Request Note is BLANK and is required for any requests to Service Partner's i.e. Spark
.
{!Footnote_ExitWindow}

fields.name: Request_Submitted_MSG
fields.fieldText:
Your request has been submitted
.
{!Footnote_ExitWindow}

screens.name: Request_Type_and_Note_Blank_SCRN
screens.label: Request Type and Note Blank SCRN

fields.name: Request_Type_and_Note_Blank_MSG
fields.fieldText:
Note: The Spark Service Request Type and Request Note are BLANK and are required for any request submission to any Service Partner i.e. Spark
.
{!Footnote_ExitWindow}

fields.name: Request_Type_Not_Specified_MSG
fields.fieldText:
Note: The Spark Service Request Type is BLANK and is required for any requests to Service Partner's i.e. Spark
.
{!Footnote_ExitWindow}

fields.name: Review_Additional_SR_MSG
fields.fieldText:
Note: This is to submit an Additional Request within the existing case
.
{!ReviewInstructions}
.
Case Record Type: {!sObjRecordType.Name}
Product Category: {!ProductType}
Type: {!sObjCase.Type}
.
Request Note:
{!sObjCase.Spark_Request_Note__c}
.
{!Footnote_ExitWindow}

textTemplates.name: Footnote_ExitWindow
textTemplates.text: To exit or close current window - use the 'x' in the top right part of the window or use keyboard shortcut: Alt + F4

textTemplates.name: RemedyAutomation
textTemplates.text: Untick the box if you wish to submit request directly to Spark Service Desk. This will utilise main systems, although the capture and recording of Work Order or Incident Reference number will have to captured manually

textTemplates.name: ReviewInstructions
textTemplates.text: Please review your request details below, if Correct and you wish to submit request, click 'NEXT' or exit window

textTemplates.name: SF_SRorINC_to_Remedy_Chttr
textTemplates.text: As the case was marked escalated to Spark, an email has been automatically sent to Spark ServiceNow email address. A Spark ServiceNow ticket should be created shortly.

textTemplates.name: SF_SRorINC_to_ServiceDesk_Chttr
textTemplates.text: As the case was marked escalated to Spark, an email has been automatically send to Spark Service Desk email address. Please obtain relevant ticket number from Spark and capture it against the case.

textTemplates.name: SF_SRUpgrade_to_Remedy_Chttr
textTemplates.text: As the upgrade/downgrade has been approved and the case Spark Service Request type has been correctly specified an email has been automatically sent to Spark ServiceNow email address.A Spark ServiceNow ticket should be created shortly
